nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_677
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It is a great pleasure to meet friends from afar.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_678
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It doesn't matter whether the cat is black or white as long as it catches mice.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_679
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: You must let me have the money back without fail by ten o'clock tomorrow morning.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_680
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Allow me to take part in this project: I am more than a little interested in it.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_681
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Everyone knows that he is special: He is free to come and go as he pleases.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_682
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Watching the unhappy look on her face, I felt as though she wished to say something to me.
